latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

pastInspections.result: Passed inspection Violations corrected at time of inspection

violations.Violation Summary: There were no new violations observed at the time of this inspection/visit
At time of inspection it was observed in the child care service that a bathroom/closet or other enclosed space has a locking mechanism solely operable from inside the space
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service/camp obstructed DOHMH staff from conducting duties of the Department at the time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to designate/identify a qualified Education Director
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Appropriate child activity not provided by child care service unacceptable forms of discipline utilized by staff of child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Daily schedule not provided or maintained at time of inspection
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations
